name: roastbeet
text: Woo! I am definitely not afraid of the fucking DENTIST

name: overmedicated
text: Hehe, nice.

name: wino
text: anyone ever actually do shots of scope?  its the only scenario where you vomit uncontrollably and can still make out with a girl in the following seconds.

name: killerlimpet
text:
No, but they drank Listerine at my high school.

I hate people.

name: norrin
text: I'd love to see what type of girls will make out with a dude who puked 10 seconds ago. I have no doubt they exist, I just want to see them.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: They're best to be looked at only AFTER you drink the scope.

name: notcool
text: These girls ain't "focusers."

name: fuzzyshoo
text: Avatar accompanies post well, short pause, eyes bug out and he says "Focusers". Ocular Shenanigans chubby for you.

name: daedala_x
text: I feel the same way about hot lesbians.

name: zapatos
text:
I've been with three.

I could show you the world...

name: mikeronomicon
text: I don't dude, they are probably hell of nasty, the kind of girl that would let a dude puke on her vag and be ok with it. That is dog shit. That is nasty.

name: rasalghul
text: You can see them on Girls with Low Self Esteem

name: jollysaintpete
text: actually the scope isn't totally necessary for that...[i]promise

name: jollysaintpete
text: hah, i wanted italics, but that worked out better than most code failures...

name: greenkoolayd
text: how desperate does one have to be to drink scope(perfume, listerine, vanilla extract, etc)?  its similar to those weirdo fucks that drink Rx cough syrup recreationally...

name: deimosrising
text:
First Lyle in Misfits shirt, first Sex funeral. An historic strip.

Note for the interested: Scope is not a good thing to be intoxicated by.

name: ambala
text: I never want to see a band's first gig, even if there is Scope.

name: woodenteeth
text: A band should stay in the fucking rehearsal studio until they're good and ready.

name: juancarlos
text: Another four, but yeah, the strip being Cornelius and Todd's adventures really weirds me out. I wonder if Cornelius was really old from the get-go.

name: mortshire
text: the bathrobe and pince-nez seem to indicate "well-aged, like scotch."

name: shutup_shutup
text: Determining age for the characters based on appearance when they were acting primarily as alive stuffed animals is a little questionable. They would have been constructed (sewn I guess?) in their current forms. The Philippe doll could be older than the Mr. Bear but Mr. Bear would still appear more stately than the young/retarded Philippe.

name: rowboat
text: I'm pretty sure that Onstad (and most everyone else) would prefer that people forget that they were ever stuffed animals. It hasn't been part of the story for, like, eight years now.

name: rowboat
text: In short: shutup_shutup

name: billyamericana
text: Listerine is $2.

name: jokercross
text: That is way too much for scope.

name: a_dude
text: Lyle gets so drunk he shits himself.

name: rapid_roy
text: Every band starts somewhere; I guess Lyle played for hobos in an alley.

name: wonelove
text: no no, the band members are the hobos in an alley.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: I wonder what kind of scummy venue of a dive bar Lyle's gig is at. At least now Lyle wears a T-shirt.

name: stuart
text: It was called the Moonlight Café. It was a barn with the roof blown off.

name: tellumo
text: The band is called "Sex Funeral" and they charge $1 for a shot of Scope. This is the kind of gig where if you still have all your teeth at the end of the night, you got RIPPED OFF.

name: max
text: Now that's my kind of funeral.

name: sargasm
text: Teodor is ENORMOUS here.

name: direhaggis
text: The moustache no longer resembles a stealth bomber.

name: em2
text: Yeah, and the Misfits shirt is in place too. All that's missing is a bottle of booze (or Scope).

name: tombsgrave
text: You know, I always assumed the Scope meant that whatever was going to happen was going to leave the worst taste imaginable in the viewer's mouth, to the point where paying a buck for a shot of Scope sounded like a reasonable proposition.  The alcoholic content sailed passed me like a poorly-aimed paper airplane.

name: wae
text:
I think it may be better that way.

I'm not sure, but I'm pretty sure.

name: woodenteeth
text: Every paper airplane I ever aimed never hit target either. Your analogy missed me like a poorly aimed punch in the face.

name: lokier
text: a dollar a scope shot is pretty expensive, non?

name: spectre
text: See, you don't have to present an ID to buy a bottle of scope . . . and if they catch, like a whole bunch of 17-year-olds all Scoped out, the cops still ca'nt make a bust. Strategy, man. Strategy is everything.

name: ngazin
text: I performed a show as Sex Funeral.  It was awesome.  We got in a lot of trouble because we said that all the other bands playing at CBGBs Downstairs Lounge that night were awful and that we were the best band in the world.  The next band shoved their amp at one of my band guys and argued with us.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
for some reason, i find that a great story.

chubbied.

name: laserblade
text: It ends with a very Onstadian non-punchline.  Actually I think I'll chubby it too.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you are most assuredly lying.

name: nerdjcrudbird
text: i'll take 3!

name: rowboat
text: For a relatively minor character, Lyle has undergone more bodily and facial hair-related transformations from Then to Now than anyone.  More than Star Jones, even.

name: sje46
text:
WOW MORE SO THAN EVENSTAR JONES!!!!!
<3<3<3
I LOVE YOU ROWBOAT . .. .FROM THE FUTURE!!!!!!

name: rowboat
text: *bro grabs*

name: i_love_kate
text: Bro grabs.

name: greenkoolayd
text: is that a thug-hug? (that tough guy thing where dudes who are afraid of committing to being casually affection to another dude clasp opposite hands and half hug at the same time.....)

name: rowboat
text: No, a bro grab is just a regular hug followed by a blowjob.

name: greenkoolayd
text: gross.  dudehugs are for homosexuals.......

name: rowboat
text: It's only right and natural.

name: history
text:
I thought that was called a brojob?

Isn't a bro grab where you politely reach around?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Ohhh. Now I get this whole thing. I came across this strip via the random function two days ago, and just a few minutes ago, via the same function, came across the strip where rowboat finds sje's first post, and sje threatens to go make fun of rowboat's first post. And he sorta did.

Huh.

name: rowboat
text: Yeah. We have fun.

name: rowboat
text: I guess 1 years is the highest assetbar can count. That was definitely more than 1 years ago.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I think after 12 months and before 24 months counts as being in the "1 year ago" range.  There are older posts listed as "2 years ago"

name: rowboat
text: It seems like I have seen some "2 years ago" posts now that I think about it. However, my above post was definitely made more than two years ago, so make of it what you will.

name: fineoakstructure
text: (I'm probably not gonna think about it too much.)

name: rowboat
text: (You fucking know you will.)

name: fineoakstructure
text:
You were right, I now think about it a lot during my archive trips.

God dammit.

Crap.

name: rowboat
text: For what it's worth, it now says 2 years. I guess I was just a few months off.

name: rowboat
text: It's gotta be coming up on three years pretty soon here. Seems like, ten.

name: rowboat
text: I meant to, do that.

name: sje46
text: It was so long ago I started coming here...I was just a child...

name: pillbot
text: haha...we did shots of Scope in junior high...it was free.

name: greenkoolayd
text: how desperate does one have to be to drink scope(perfume, listerine, vanilla extract, etc)? its similar to those weirdo fucks that drink Rx cough syrup recreationally...

name: envika
text: Mr. Bear clearly disapproves of Scope. Because Listerine is better.

name: gbeaton
text: A shot of Scope is better than a shot of Aqua Velva, this is truth.

name: i_pose_4_nolan
text: Sex Funeral-A band for which I have the greatest respect.

name: snowman
text: Lyle came into his own with this strip.

name: jjg
text: Kids be all at drinking mouthwash for the 'alcohol' around my little nephew's hangouts. Honestly, if they laced milk with LSD and charged a dollar a shot NOBODY would ever get calcium deficiency. It's a big problem where I come from. Brittle bones. Gran has it.

name: lux
text: Moloko plus is where it's at.

name: odweed
text: Should be closer to 5 :)

name: thatgunskid
text: that was great.

name: aristagoras
text: This is the first glimpse of the true Lyle. Even with the strip no longer worried about preserving a concept of housebound stuffed animals, it's still quite Lyle to sell Scope shots.

name: babeeazz
text: this is the first one i've read that's made me laugh out loud.  granted, i've only read about 8 so far.

name: hellame
text: SCOOOOPE...minty fresh!

name: sparhawk
text: In the days before story arcs we missed out on the rivalry between Sex Funeral and Connie's band, Ethelbert and the Silly old Things.

name: wonglers
text: Lyle replaced his alcohol addiction with Scope.  It helped him lose the weight.

name: aljazeera
text: I had a teacher that poured whiskey and scope into his coffee.  Lyle and him would make a power duo.

name: howl
text: As someone who once drank coffee after brushing their teeth, I find this horrifying.

name: juggler
text: Téodor and Cornelius are in essentially the same positions as the previous strip.  They replace Philippe with... with Lyle.
